tool_description: This API generates random quotes based on requests. It also gives the detail of who wrote it.
name: Random Quotes Generator
title: Random Quotes Generator

api_list.name: Get Random Quote
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a random quote with the information of the author and related tags.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-quotes-generator.p.rapidapi.com/get_quote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-quotes-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://random-quotes-generator.p.rapidapi.com/get_quote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-quotes-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
